mapper.select: SELECT APT_ID as aptId, HIST_STRT_DTS as histStrtDts, HIST_END_DTS as histEndDts, APT_NM as aptNm, RGN_CD as rgnCd, RGN_DTL_CD as rgnDtlCd, ADDRESS as address, APT_YEAR as aptYear, UNIT_AMT as unitAmt, PLOT_RATE as plotRate, REG_DTS as regDts, REGPE_ID as regpeId, MOD_DTS as modDts, MODPE_ID as modpeId FROM APT
SELECT RGN_CD as rgnCd, RGN_NM as rgnNm FROM REGION GROUP BY RGN_CD, RGN_NM
SELECT RGN_DTL_CD as rgnDtlCd, RGN_DTL_NM as rgnDtlNm FROM REGION WHERE 1=1 AND RGN_CD = #{rgnCd}
